alert.note: Alert for Andrews; Ector; Midland; Winkler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 6:13PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Ector, south central Andrews, west central Midland and northeastern Winkler Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 613 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Goldsmith, or 20 miles west of Odessa, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Odessa, Goldsmith, West Odessa, Midland International Air and Space Port, Odessa Schlemeyer Field, Notrees and Warfield. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 104 and 127. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
